text: Mati Airport (Cebuano: Tugpahanan sa Mati), formerly Imelda R. Marcos Airport, is an airport that serves the general area of Mati, the capital city of the province of Davao Oriental in the Philippines. It is the only airport in Davao Oriental. The airport is classified as a secondary airport by the Civil Aviation Authority of the Philippines, a body of the Department of Transportation that is responsible for the operations of not only this airport but also of all other airports in the Philippines except the major international airports. There are no flights serving Mati however domestic and international air services are available to and from Davao City. ==Airlines and destinations== Category:Airports in the Philippines Category:Buildings and structures in Davao Oriental Category:Transportation in Mindanao
title: Mati Airport
